transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan ji sir.
Executive: Haan ji bataiye.
Customer: Haan main theek hoon boliye.
Executive: Sir, ye ticket open hua hai, ye hua hai sir, aapne call kiya hoga mere ko. Ye kiya tha aapne 7th November ko, to main call pick nahi kar payi, fir uske baad hamari baat hui thi whatsapp pe hui thi. To maine please kar diya to ye ticket open ho gaya sir isliye ki matlab service related aapko koi issue tha na by lead ka.
Customer: Haan to mere ko batao ek baar by lead jo maine bheji thi wo aapne consume ki hai sir?
Executive: To by lead share kiya tha.
Customer: Wo khuli nahi usme pata nahi.
Executive: Nahi hua. Done. Aapne link pe click kiya uske baad aapke paas ek code aaya hoga matlab number dalne ke liye to aapne usme apna number add karna tha. Number add karke ha number add karke aapke number pe OTP aata hai aap jaise hi us OTP ko usme daloge wo open ho jata hai then usme sir ek cheez aur hoti hai contact by now ka button hota hai theek hai aap us pe jaise hi us pe click kar doge contact by now pe to aapka detail jo hai aap seller panel mein jaake lead manager ka jo option hota hai na by lead ke upar.
Hmm hmm.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Aap waha pe bhi dekh sakte ho ye fir.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Haan ji dusra sir abhi teen by lead main recent ka dekh rahi hoon ek minute rukiye.
Customer: Aapne aaj jo by lead consume ki hai ye ki hai Saurabh Alam ki colorful crackers ke liye aur ye Jharia ki lead by lead aapne consume kiya aaj ki hai aapne.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Executive: To inse connect ho paya aapka buyer se?
Customer: Abhi baat nahi hui abhi karenge thodi der mein.
Executive: Achcha abhi matlab buyer se properly connect nahi ho paya. Theek hai aur ek mere paas dekho sir do by lead aapko jo show ho rahi hai jo main to us din bheji thi wo to abhi hamari purani ho gayi kyuki wo lead ye samajh lo aap do teen din pehle ki to unko to consume karne ka sir koi fayda nahi mujhe itna jyada nahi hai. To ek by lead hai ye Bankura West Bengal ki do ghante pehle aayi hui hai buyer jo hai email pe available hai verified hai and whatsapp jo hota hai buyer ka wo bhi available hai aur ye colorful crackers ki lead hai 1000 boxes ki demand hai che saal se jyada buyer ko ho gaye hai IndiaMART mein 9 lakh 38000 ka order hai.
Customer: Theek hai kar do isko.
Executive: Theek hai to ek minute rukiye main ye wali by lead apne ko share kar rahi hoon aapko trade.indiamart.com se utha ke aapko whatsapp pe share kar rahi hoon main call pe.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Sir aap na ek kaam kiya kariye jaise by lead jaise maine us din bataya tha na jaise trick wise consume karte ho.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: To usme kya hota hai jaise ek ghanta do ghanta pehle by lead hai ab aapne sabse pehle consume kar li to aapki wo wali by lead koi dusra supplier jo IndiaMART pe hoga aapka competitor wo consume nahi kar payega fir aapki ye wali by lead.
Customer: Achcha achcha achcha.
Executive: Samajh rahe hai matlab ye wo ho jata hai ki ek by lead ko jisne pehle consume kar liya wo uski mani jati hai.
Customer: Achcha achcha theek hai.
Executive: Haan maine dekho abhi jo 9 lakh wala order hai wo aapko maine whatsapp pe share kiya hai ek by lead aur bhej rahi hoon main aapko relevant hai sir ek ye aaya hua hai mere paas 50000 ka order hai celebration firework ke naam se.
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: To isme deal karte ho aap? Kya celebration firework?
Customer: Haan celebration firework. Aisa kuch aata hai kya?
Executive: Ye to wo ho gaya na patakhe type ke item ho gaye na ye.
Executive: Haan haan patakhe type ke aur crackers ki lead aayi.
Customer: Haan crackers crackers.
Executive: Theek hai. To main ye 25 wali bhej rahi hoon aapko ek minute call pe rukiye.
Executive: Sir ye Ghaziabad ki lead hai aapke liye matlab location wise jyada difference nahi rahega.
Executive: Maine ye wali by lead bhi aapko whatsapp ki hai to abhi hamare paas dekho do by lead hai aap in dono by lead ko consume kar lena sir fir uske baad abhi main ticket close kar rahi hoon aapko ticket se related to koi problem nahi hai na services wagera se.
Customer: Nahi nahi hogi to main bata dunga koi dikkat nahi hai.
Executive: Hai na agar kuch aisa rehta hai kuch doubt ya koi query ya kuch aapko puchna bhi rehta hai mere end se to aap direct ya to mere ko whatsapp kar dena ya mere same number pe aap call kar dena aur sir isme ek cheez aur batani hai 17 by lead jaise hamari hafte mein hai to hume ek by lead daily ki mil rahi hai bonus wali aur 10 by lead hume sunday ko mil jati hai aapko kal 10 by lead mili hai aur jo daily wali hai aapko ek by lead to at least per day mein consume karni hai jisse aapka relevant option jo hai wo badhte rahenge aur relevancy achi khasi bani rehti hai theek hai na ha to aap wo kar lijiye baki main ticket close kar de rahi hoon.
Customer: Hmm theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai okay sir thank you so much.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer had issues accessing buyleads.

- Customer wants relevant buyleads.



Resolution:

- Executive explained how to access buyleads.

- Executive shared three relevant buyleads via WhatsApp.

- Executive explained how to consume buyleads.



Next Steps: 

- Ticket closed.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, whatsapp, trade
